pageHeader.subtitle: >- The Flexible Messaging Area (FMA) on the Macromedia.com homepage highlighted the usefulness and abilities of Macromedia digital products.
pageHeader.description: >- Macromedia launched their new website with a particular area they called the Flexible Messaging Area (FMA) on the front page. This was an ever-evolving and interactive space focused on specific products and offerings from Macromedia. It offered entertainment and showed the capabilities of tools using Flash, their flagship product.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
